title: Toronto health officials warn to avoid coffee or dinner dates amid COVID-19 pandemic - CTV News
description: Toronto’s chief medical officer of health called on residents Wednesday to go the extra step to practice social distancing as much as possible, saying that Toronto is at a critical juncture where we should anticipate a steep rise in cases.
